name: Tribal Boundary
description: A border between tribal territories defines traditional lands and creates opportunities for intertribal relations. The cultural significance makes it a focus for tribal politics and diplomacy, while the crossing points create opportunities for cultural exchange and trade.
atmosphere: Traditional boundary marked by totems and sacred symbols while tribal customs govern passage between territories. Ancient agreements and blood feuds influence relations as cultural traditions change dramatically across the line. Where ancestral lands meet in honor or hostility.
